text: Peter Hardeman Burnett (November 15, 1807 - May 17, 1895) was an American politician. He was the first Governor of California, Burnett was also a white supremacist. He tried to ban black people from California and supported genocide of the state's indigenous peoples. He was Governor from December 20, 1849 to January 9, 1851. He was also the first California Governor to resign. ==References== ==Other websites== * Peter Hardeman Burnett at the Roman Catholic Encyclopedia * Peter Burnett biography at the California State Library * Guide to the Peter H.
